00015 public class OracleDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00016     public static final String PRODUCT_NAME = "oracle";
00017 
00018     public void setConnection(Connection conn) {
00019         try {
00020             Method method = conn.getClass().getMethod("setRemarksReporting", Boolean.TYPE);
00021             method.setAccessible(true);
00022             method.invoke(conn, true);
00023         } catch (Exception e) {
00024             log.info("Could not set remarks reporting on OracleDatabase: "+e.getMessage());
00025             ; //cannot set it. That is OK
00026         }
00027         super.setConnection(conn);
00028     }
00029

00079     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00080         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00081     }

00083     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00084         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:oracle")) {
00085             return "oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver";
00086         }
00087         return null;
00088     }

00119     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00120         String normalLiteral = super.getDateLiteral(isoDate);
00121 
00122         if (isDateOnly(isoDate)) {
00123             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00124             val.append("to_date(");
00125             val.append(normalLiteral);
00126             val.append(", 'YYYY-MM-DD')");
00127             return val.toString();
00128         } else if (isTimeOnly(isoDate)) {
00129             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00130             val.append("to_date(");
00131             val.append(normalLiteral);
00132             val.append(", 'HH24:MI:SS')");
00133             return val.toString();
00134         } else if (isDateTime(isoDate)) {
00135             normalLiteral = normalLiteral.substring(0, normalLiteral.lastIndexOf('.'))+"'";
00136 
00137             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer(26);
00138             val.append("to_date(");
00139             val.append(normalLiteral);
00140             val.append(", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')");
00141             return val.toString();
00142         } else {
00143             return "UNSUPPORTED:" + isoDate;
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     public SqlStatement getSelectChangeLogLockSQL() throws JDBCException {
00148         return new RawSqlStatement((super.getSelectChangeLogLockSQL().getSqlStatement(this) + " for update").toUpperCase());
00149     }
00150 
00151     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00152         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQUENCE_NAME FROM ALL_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_OWNER = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "'");
00153     }
00154 
00155 
00156     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00157         if (super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)) {
00158             return true;
00159         } else if (tableName.startsWith("BIN$")) { //oracle deleted table
00160             return true;
00161         } else if (tableName.startsWith("AQ$")) { //oracle AQ tables
00162             return true;
00163         } else if (tableName.startsWith("DR$")) { //oracle index tables
00164             return true;
00165         }
00166         return false;
00167     }
00168 
00169 
00170     public boolean shouldQuoteValue(String value) {
00171         return super.shouldQuoteValue(value) && !value.startsWith("to_date(");
00172     }
00173 
00174     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00175         return true;
00176     }

00178     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00179         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT TEXT FROM ALL_VIEWS WHERE upper(VIEW_NAME)='"+name.toUpperCase()+"' AND OWNER='"+convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName)+"'" );
00180     }

00186     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00187         if (defaultValue != null) {
00188             if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00189                 if (dataType == Types.DATE || dataType == Types.TIME || dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00190                     if (((String) defaultValue).indexOf("YYYY-MM-DD HH") > 0) {
00191                         defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^to_date\\('","").replaceFirst("', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'\\)$","");
00192                     } else if (((String) defaultValue).indexOf("YYYY-MM-DD") > 0) {
00193                         defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^to_date\\('","").replaceFirst("', 'YYYY-MM-DD'\\)$","");
00194                     } else {
00195                         defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^to_date\\('","").replaceFirst("', 'HH24:MI:SS'\\)$","");
00196                     }
00197                 }
00198                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("'\\s*$", "'"); //sometimes oracle adds an extra space after the trailing ' (see http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1824663&group_id=187970&atid=923443).  
00199             }
00200         }
00201         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00202     }

00224     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00225         String s = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00226         return s.replaceAll("VARCHAR2", "VARCHAR");
00227     }
